name: peppermint
text: I almost take offense at that. I'm gay, and I love hot sauce.

name: agika
text: I bet you don't waste money on it, though.  Straight people are deficient in that way, I guess, all spendin' too much money for hot sauce or something.

name: senseihollywood
text:
yo- it's true -I spend one metric shitload of loot on Sriracha...
[IMGS OFF]

name: kazad
text: Delicious.

name: ferdinand
text: the best hot sause. spice and flavour.

name: ferdinand
text: sauce.  what the hell.

name: c_dizzle
text: don't fret. i just imagined it pronounced, "sah-oos" when you said it. awesome.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: A comment left by godfatherofsouls was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, all-star951, almightygosh)

name: cryztal
text: 'Round these parts, we call that "Cock Sauce."

name: sirlucas
text: We call that cock sauce where I'm from.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i call that cock a rooster.(lame?  i care not.)

name: fermatprime
text: You, my friend, are buying it at the wrong places. Or using way too fucking much . I can get 17 oz for $3 at the Korean grocery across the street.

name: chaesar
text: "Capitol Punishment" chipotle-habanero sauce with some guy strapped to an electric chair on the bottle. Straight dudes eat that stuff by the gallon cause they are wondering where their vestigial dongs are at.

name: nixnada
text: Gay people get their hot sauce from eBay Homosexual Reserve.

name: terribleman
text: I get my hot sauce from the Achewood store.

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, straw, Norsef, Thorfinn, SchnappM, DeimosRising, barfighting, equinn2006, waldo913, Sargasm, HolyQ, DrSkradley, mira, luckypyjamas, aHatOfPig, davidadam, Afkpuz, suprememongoose, eRiUukFJk, scraggg, lastlarf, Arcibi, stormagnet, slalvation)

name: ford
text: Not that he's around anymore, but i always wondered how much of this guy's shit was just to fuck with people.

name: waldo913
text: we have some sort of conformation that retardo has moved on to greener (gayer) pastures?

name: salvagebar
text: Does it matter? It was funny stuff, for the most part. Thank you, retardo, wherever you are.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Definitely a camp post.

name: epicurus
text: Pat's dad's hair looks EXACTLY like the hair of my previous boss, who was gay. Later, when Pat has been out for a while, he is basically the cartoon cat version of my old boss. I felt a little cold when I saw it, because it was like Onstad was also working in that seafood restaurant that summer.

name: agika
text: How do you know he was not?  You don't know, do you?  Onstad is a crazy guy, I hear - maybe he WAS trying to mess with your mind.

name: agika
text: "Whoops!  Why do I keep puttin those up there, anyway?"

name: zem
text: I'm surprised Cornelius knew that's Michael Jackson's move, and cared enough to identify it.

name: honesttom
text: Connie is a man with hidden depths.

name: ttagxamm
text: Long ago, in another life, he was an AD on The Abominable Dr. Phibes, and has followed Vincent Price's career with interest ever since.

name: cracklewater
text:
Michael Jackson will be found dead in three days' time.

This is a PREDICTION!

name: neitherman
text: A comment left by neitherman was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by twohundredninety, mortshire, angelaw6745, seren_tremio, echidnaboy)

name: epicurus
text: Wouldn't that imply that your roomate is heterosexual? So I take it that you are female and have been assuming your roomate is a gay man and therefore not attracted to you? I don't know what is going on here.

name: neitherman
text: No, I would imply that gay men be frontin' by buying loads of hot sauce.  I guess I interpreted Simon's line differently.  However, the situation you have painted is comical, good sir.

name: boredom_man
text: I am very much creating a comic book character who is an extreme purchaser of hot sauce by day and a serial gay rapist at night

name: epicurus
text:
Oh my GOD YES.

Which is both my response to your idea and the first line of dialog in issue #1.

name: epicurus
text:
Okay I understand now Neitherman.

You know, I buy quite a bit of hot sauce myself... am I...

... a badminton player?

name: sirfrederick
text:
My favourite part is the implication that gay men are dangerous to have around, to the same extent as, say, someone who killed nine men in the French Foreign Legion.

"Don't go to sleep near Lucid Coster, he'll eat one of your eyeballs. But at least he's straight."

name: centipede_damascus
text: Dirt Man Idiot is a cool guy with good music, but he cannot for the life of him think up a new move.

name: aaron_haynes
text: I love the running gag of Ray putting a martini up on his monitor while talking on the phone, and it falling off a few panels later.

name: luckyg
text: I didn't even notice that. Kudos to you, sir.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i...

man what

name: cheeks_jd
text: but what is his arm doing on that panel in these running gags? It always looked odd to me.

name: fielding
text: I think he's reaching out to try to grab it as it falls.  He was too slow.

name: heccibiggs
text: Sorry to reply to your comment of a year ago, but I think he is just giving a thumbs-down to the whole turn of events.

name: fielding
text: There's no need to apologize.  But if he's giving a thumbs-down, it's a very poor thumbs-down.  There's hardly any thumb at all.

name: fielding
text:
I...

...

...give his thumbs-down a thumbs-down.

name: steerpike66
text: "Stop wasting money on hot sauce and posters" Excellent. I like hot sauce but my fat straight brother in law actually collects the dang stuff, like there's more than five varieties of hot. After you get that stuff in the black cottle from belize, you're done. Mind you; he does have a ramped up yellow hummer, a eight-foot HD TV and twelve pounds of decomposing meat in his bowels at all times.

name: epicurus
text: In fairness, 12 pounds of meat in your bowels is usually  a sign that you're gay.

name: joeyramoney
text: you deserve a pulitzer for that comment.

name: pogo
text: Or at least a Chubbitzer.

name: dovey
text:
I feel bad for chubbing that comment.

That comment is a guilty pleasure.

name: boredom_man
text: That's absurd. Everyone knows that the best hot sauce in Belize is Marie Sharps' habanero with the carrot base. Marie Sharps' black label with the lime (ooooh, original) is a blatantly inferior sauce, and the stuff is $12 for five ounces if you have it shipped to you in the States. Honestly, how did he miss this information? It's on every marriage license.

name: latterman
text:
Gladdington Castle? More like Glaadington Castle.

Can anyone see what I just did there?

name: tagrineth
text: I C WUT U DID THAR

name: dj_insomniac
text: Shame on you. Even if you have Nakoruru as your avatar.

name: tagrineth
text: I know. I know. But someone had to say it..

name: zem
text: did you notice that every time someone says this, they are wrong wrong wrong ?

name: riazm
text: I have a unisex Paco Rabanne cologne that I wear on days when I am feeling androgynous.

name: deovalente
text: Ray greets Simon and immediately notices his watch.

name: dovey
text: Ray compliments Simon's watch before Simon even says a word.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Ray appreciates Nice things.

name: turnabout
text: The things is, Achewood actually does a pretty good business in hot sauce and posters.

name: atticusonline
text: My mind is blown.

name: zapatos
text: oh shit I have bottles of Ray's Rad Chilis in my pantry.  Oh Shiiiit!

name: prettyrad
text:
This is the first time I've ever used "Random comic", and it has given me the first Achewood I ever read.

THIS IS SO WACKYYYYYY

text:
Your comment and avatar completely match.

Also, I agree, that shit is wacky.

name: selbencoirlo
text: Does the way Ray basically left Cornelius stranded on his other line while he went off to chum with Simon stress anyone else out? Man, Ray. Not cool.

name: greenkoolayd
text: its not as if it were unexpected.  those people know ray and the way he operates...

name: tripleg
text: Simon does not comment on the watch because he recognizes it is a reflex for Ray to complement watches, as if that were part of a standard North American Greeting.

name: tragicone
text: 45000th view

name: zem
text: grats

text: That's Michael's move.

text: Sorry, Dirt Man Idiot. Even post 6/25/09 its still Michael's move...

text: it is crazy.

name: greenkoolayd
text: "...read peoples energy more shrewdly..."-is that that " gaydar thing people talk about?

name: carlyle
text: I love Simon

name: terribleman
text: Do you know that he is gay?

name: carlyle
text: Can't a man love another man without bein' gay? Plus the guy's just likable. Down to earth. A sensible man.

name: anzio
text: Wow, I never noticed til now that while Ray is on the phone with Beef, he puts his martini on top of his monitor, it falls, and he gets upset and cleans it up. That's just some awesome detailing right there.
